resources.string: Recharging. Are you sure to pause recharging and start cleaning?
Recharging failed, the dock charger is not connected to an outlet
When this mode is enabled, the robot will automatically identify a carpet and apply the maximum vacuum to clean the carpet, and resume its normal vacuum when the robot steps off the carpet.
*Minor entanglement will be neglected in this mode.
My master, I have finished the cleaning task. Will you show my outcome to your friend?
Cleaning finished, automatically return to recharge
Are you sure to pause cleaning?
Cleaning. Are you sure to pause cleaning and start recharging?
Please check the machine and eliminate the error

A strainer is made of polymeric fibers and used to prevent dust escaping from the dust bin. The strainer may be gradually blocked and invalidated over time. It is recommended to change the strainer every 150 running hours or less.

A main brush is a major cleaning part for the robot and integrated to rotate in high speed to roll waste up into the dust bin. but it may be gradually worn over time, thereby affecting the cleaning effect. It is recommended to change it every 300 work hours or less.

A side brush is used to clean waste in corners. It comes into contact with the ground at a gold angle and sends the waste into a main brush, but it may be gradually worn over time, thereby affecting the cleaning effect. It is recommended to change it every 200 work hours or less.
Please select your country or region
Thank you for your support with our Xiaowa Robotic Vacuum Cleaner. For any problem encountered during use of the product, you can:
follow our WeChat %1$s to reach to our customer support in real time
call the Roborock customer support hotline at: %1$s
Clean the dust bin and strainer
The machine is inclined when starting. Please place the machine on a level floor and start it.
Please place the machine on a level floor and start it
Too high or too low battery temperature. Please wait until the battery temperature gets right before use.
Please wait until the battery temperature gets right before use
The cleaning effect may be compromised if the dust bin is left uncleaned for a prolonged period of time. Please regularly clean the dust bin.
Please regularly clean the dust bin for me
The bumper gets stuck. Please lightly tap to remove foreign matters for several times; if no foreign matters are found, please move the machine to a new location and start it.
Please clean and lightly tap the bumper
Please use dry cloth to wipe the charging contact of the machine and charging tab of the dock charger.
Please try to clean the charging contact area
Please use dry cloth to wipe the recharge sensor and try again.

The machine is suspended. Please move it to a place near its original location and start it; this problem may be caused when the cliff sensor is too dirty. Please wipe the cliff sensor to eliminate this problem
Please wipe the cliff sensor and move the machine to a place near its original location and start it
The machine is too close to the virtual wall when starting, or a high-intensity magnetic field is detected. Please move it to a new location and start it.
Please move the machine to a new location and start it
Connect to the dock charger for charging
Battery low. Please carry the machine back to the dock charger for charging.
Battery low. Please carry the machine back to the dock charger for charging
The dock charger is powered on
The power cable for the dock charger may not be properly connected. Please connect the power cable and then try to recharge again.
Check that the power cable is properly connected
Please clear an obstacle (if any) around the signal emission area of the dock charger and keep the emission area unblocked.
Please clear the signal emission area of the dock charger
Wheels are suspended. Please move the machine to a place near its original location
Please move the machine to a place near its original location
Please reinstall the dust bin and strainer and check that they are installed in place; if the problem persists, try to replace the strainer.
Please reinstall the dust bin or strainer
The dust collection fan may be entangled with foreign matters. Please try to reset the system.
Please try to reset the system
Malfunction due to internal error; please try to reset the system; If the problem persists after resetting, contact our customer service center at 4009001755.
Please try to reset the system
The LDS is blocked or gets stuck by a foreign matter. Please remove the blockage or foreign matter. If the problem persists, move the machine to a new location and start it.
Please toggle the orange laser head and check that there is no blockage or jamming
The main brush may be entangled with foreign matters
Remove the main brush and its bearing for cleaning and then restart the machine.
Please remove the main brush and its bearing for cleaning
The side brush module malfunctions. Please try to reset the system.
Please try to reset the system
The side brush may be entangled with foreign matters
Remove the side brush for cleaning and then restart the machine.
Please remove and clean the side brush
The strainer may be blocked. Please clean it; if the problem persists, please replace the strainer.
Please check that the strainer is dried or clean the strainer

string.name: error_strainer_sub_content
string.b: Note: Do not wash the strainer with water

resources.string: The machine may get stuck or caught
Please clear obstacles around the machine; otherwise, move the machine to a new location and start it.
Please clear obstacles around the machine
The ground tracking sensor may be dirty or blocked. Please use dry cloth to wipe the motion tracking sensor and place the machine back to its original location and start it
Please clean the motion tracking sensor and place the machine back to its original location and start it
The wall sensor is blocked by dust. Please wipe the dust off the wall sensor.
The vacuum is stuck or the wheels are blocked
Please rotate the main wheel to remove foreign matters or move the machine to a new location and start it.
%1$d hours may be required to clean
%1$d hours may be required to replace
1. Use your finger to remove the filter assemblies in the left and right along the notch
2. Install a new filter assembly in place

The filter assembly is used to filter out foreign matters and works by taking advantage of capillary-size pores to suction water from the water tank to evenly wet the mopping cloth to achieve good performance. The filter may be blocked over time (yellowing). It is recommended to replace a filter assembly every 1-3 months to ensure the cleaning effect, depending on the quality of water and frequency of use.

"Please use fresh water without any cleaner Do not use a brush or your finger to clean the strainer to prevent damage to water-proof coating Always dry it thoroughly before use (in general, dry at least 24 hours)"
Are you sure that you have replaced the old strainer with a new one?
Please upgrade the firmware to the latest version.
Do not cut off the power supply when the machine is being powered by the dock charger and the battery is in sleep mode to maintain good performance

"The mopping mode is only intended for a cleaned floor Install the mopping module before enabling this mode
Do not use the mopping mode on a carpeted floor Use a virtual wall for blockage for a carpeted floor
The mopping mode is not recommended when there is nobody at home"

The mopping mode is only intended for a cleaned floor. Install the mopping module before use. Do not use the mopping mode on a carpeted floor. Use a virtual wall for blockage for a carpeted floor. The mopping mode is not recommended when there is nobody at home. The installed mopping module allows cleaning while mopping in cleaning mode
You can select the mopping mode from the cleaning mode on the main interface only if it is enabled

Sensors and charging tabs are prone to be dusty after the robot works for a certain period of time, which may affect the cleaning effect. It is recommended to clean it with cotton swab every 30 running hours or less.
Please check that sensors and charging tabs are cleaned

Editing the previous timer failed, try again or not?

"It's not unlike Mars here! Route-wise, I mean…"
I look nice, but I have lots of secrets inside…
"I'll plan my space conquest right after I'm done cleaning!"
"Haven't I spoiled you? Do you even remember what it feels like - cleaning?"
"I'll feel bad if I don't have all the cleaning to myself!"
Take a look! Everything is so clean! The shining is almost blinding me!
"Sometimes I think it's impossible to find a person dirtier than you are."
I nearly swallowed this weird thing yesterday. Was it yours?
"Those socks you've stolen… Hide them better next time, mm?"
At last! Counted all the floorboards. Not a single one missing.
"Not that I'm into meditation, the vacuum is just kinda my thing."
My face is too big… Take selfies with me from a flattering angle!
Your place is soo huge! The empty feeling inside is gone, though.
Look at the size of this place! May the force be with me!

You can synchronize the time zone where your mobile phone is located to your robot. Please ensure that your mobile phone works in the same time zone as your robot.
*If the robot time zone is incorrect, timer cleaning and DND mode may work in chaos.
